answers.answer: Wrong place our drugs have no sides and also cure hbv, no need to waste money in alternative places

i am sorry for the statement i had post, i am just one of the desperate hbv carriers who want to get rid of the virus.   some of us rely on alternative treatment that is why i posted that, i wanted to give them ideas and it is still up to them to try it. my gastroenterologist didn' t gave me a drug for hbv, i asked questions but didn' t gave  me an accurate answer.  i don' t want to wait until i get worst,  if alternative meds could heal me i will never know if i won' t try.  if i' d be healed then i' ll be glad to share it with them☺.

question: guys have you heard or watch healing galing?  search nyo s google hepa b healing galing, you'll find their episode of june 2013 discussing hepa b treatment.  i have consulted on their outlet only last monday june 23, 2014.  i have availed meds from them.  guys my father took synthetic meds when he was diagnose with diabetes and it worsen his illness those meds made his liver damaged until his private doctor rejected him and told him that there's no hope, my father died 10 years ago because of liver failure.  if there's no specific drug for hepa b as most of doctors says then why don' t we try alternative meds.  synthetic drugs may cure some of our illnesses but it also damage some parts of our body.  i am hoping that healing galing could help us.  watch it every saturday 6am to 10am and sunday 10am to 12nn.
title: alternative medications through healing galing
